system.requirements: .Mechanicus Related, Common Lore (Mechanicus), Tech-Use +10. Apt: Intelligence, Tech
system.descriptionText:
Character can use Order when attempting to make a Tech-Use Test to fix or operate something. Comrade in Cohesion then assists them in the task, granting a +10 Bonus. Can be used with Servitor Comrades in addition to normal ones.
Note: Mechanicus Related = Any Tech-Priest or Regiment Sworn to the Mechanicus
